channel.title: logs on Codetab
channel.description: Recent content in logs on Codetab

item.title: Logs - Scoopi Web Scraper - CodeTab
item.description: Logs Scoopi uses Logback library for logging. By default, it logs info message to console and log errors to logs/error.log file. Debug and Trace logs The logback configuration file logback.xml is located in conf folder. By default root log level is info which outputs only error, warn and info logs. To output debug logs, change root level to debug and un-comment appender-ref ref=“debuglog” element. Similarly for trace logs. Trace logs output query and parsed html nodes which is helpful to construct query strings.

item.title: Logs - Scoopi Web Scraper - why just scrape when you can scoop
